com.audianz.core

Class ConfigurationReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.audianz.core.ConfigurationReader

  • public class ConfigurationReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The ConfigurationReader class is used read and write data to configuration file. When Campaign management application is launched we check the configuration file to check login status of user.
